backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining nakshatra calculations plus in‑memory maps for user profiles, logs, and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two TodayPage hero image and layout changes with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsTog: Toggle component for enabling or disabling nakshatra alerts with custom bell glyph.
frontend/src/components/alerts/Nakshatra: Banner component showing a nakshatra shift notification with dismiss action.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper component gating content behind authentication with a sign‑in prompt.
Modal for selecting a city or using geolocation, with search filtering and error handling.
frontend/src/components/glyphs/Glyph.tsx: Renders various SVG glyph icons based on a provided type.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar with links, city picker trigger, alerts toggle, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, routed content area, and footer including version info.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Naksha: Displays a clickable card summarizing a nakshatra with name, number, symbols, and ruler.
Shows detailed nakshatra sections including symbolism, traits, themes, and other attributes using cards and accordions.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Transi: Calculates and displays estimated transition times for the next pada and nakshatra based on moon movement.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyGuida: Renders daily guidance modules for a selected nakshatra using an accordion with themed content.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyInter: Displays daily interpretation sections for a selected nakshatra using themed cards and pulls text from nakshatraDailyContent.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyLogsP: Provides forms for daily check-in, sleep, and dream logs, saving entries via user log hooks.
frontend/src/components/today/ResonanceS: Shows whether the current nakshatra resonates with the user's birth chart based on stored logs.
frontend/src/data/cities.ts: Exports a list of predefined cities with names, timezones, coordinates, and optional geolocation flag.
Defines detailed daily content for each nakshatra including mood, themes, and guidance.
frontend/src/data/nakshatras.ts: Defines static metadata for all nakshatras, including traits, symbols, deity, and padas.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCitySelection.ts: Manages the selected city with validation, localStorage sync, and live local time updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Custom hook syncing state with localStorage across tabs and within the same tab.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraAlerts.ts: Tracks nakshatra changes and shows an alert banner when a new nakshatra is detected.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraNow.ts: Computes and polls lunar longitude, validating it and querying nakshatra data based on city time.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrapper to fetch nakshatra data from the backend with validation and error logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserLogs.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and saving user logs, sleep logs, and dream logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and updates user profile and birth chart data through backend actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark themes, typography, and layout defaults.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current application version string.
frontend/src/lib/astro/lunarLongitude.ts: Calculates an approximate lunar longitude based on a given date using a simplified formula.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/nakshatraDi: Provides helpers for logging Nakshatra query failures and utilities for longitude validation and normalization.
frontend/src/lib/insights/dreamThemeExtr: Extracts keyword themes from dream logs by grouping entries by nakshatra and filtering unique non‑stopword terms.
frontend/src/lib/insights/nakshatraInsig: Generates up to three user insights by analyzing check-in patterns for energy, mood, and restlessness grouped by nakshatra.
frontend/src/lib/nakshatra/index.ts: Exports utilities to create slugs from nakshatra names and retrieve nakshatra data by slug.
frontend/src/lib/time/timezone.ts: Formats dates and constructs timezone-adjusted Date objects for current or specific instants, with fallbacks on errors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryInsightsPage.t: Displays insights, history, and dream themes based on user logs with tabbed navigation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Renders a searchable list of all nakshatras for browsing the knowledge base.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.t: Shows detailed information for a single nakshatra identified by slug, with navigation back to the knowledge base.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Provides forms for editing user profile information and birth chart settings, loading existing data when available.
frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx: Renders the Today view using current lunar data, with error and loading states and a hero section background image.
frontend/src/pages/TomorrowPage.tsx: Computes tomorrow’s lunar longitude and renders the forecast with validation, error handling, and retry logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, shadows, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking current issues and feature requirements for fixing the Today page hero image and text positioning.
